member.name: M:CarValueApi.Controllers.CarValueAppController.RunCommand(CarValueApi.Model.Root)
member.summary: This post method is used to calculate the current car value of the car with the inputed parameters you need the following post parameters: "make", "model", "year" "yearOfPurchase", "price", "color", "milage", "plateNumber". The make, model, color and plateNumber are all string variables the year, yearOfPurchase, price and milage are all integers. The api returns a new value; the carCurrentPrice which is in decimal.

member.name: M:CarValueApi.Controllers.CarValueAppController.BuyCar(CarValueApi.Model.BuyCar)
member.summary: you need the following post parameters: "car_id", "surname_input", "firstname_input", "phone_number", "email_address",
